thread.title: Hilton Islington
thread.title_full: Hilton Islington - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: grahamg211
title: Hilton Islington
text: A value for money hotel in an area that is popular/trendy for local flavours. The hotel staff were friendly, particularly at breakfast (we did not utilise dining in otherwise). The rooms were clean and spacious for London standards. Complimentary water along with tea/coffee facilities were welcome.
